entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
